content:
FYI I've posted to the team meeting notes for next week a hackmd document I put together doing a quick triage of open PRs.

  • 3 I think could use some discussion
  • 2 in FCP
  • 8 with little to no review feedback
  • 18 or so to close whether because of being stale or other reasons
  • I glossed over the build-std and host-target ones
  • The rest seem to have some promise of moving forward as of January

Thanks for the effort!
I am thinking whether a shared triage board is useful, so that we can get an overview quicker and get less of this kind of labor.
